title: Walmart | SSE | Bangalore
content:
I need a offer evaluation from Walmart

Education: B.Tech from Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 7.11y
- Current Salary - 25LPA
- Prior Experience: Product startup based in Chennai
- Date of the Offer: June 2024
- Company: Walmart
- Title/Level: IN4 (Senior Software Engineer)
- Location: Bangalore
- Salary(INR): 28.7LPA Base
- Stock bonus: 5.5 lacs
- Bonus: 6.5 lac per annum
- Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~40 lac INR
- Benefits: Standard Benefits
- Relocation: Standard Walmart Relocation

I had another offer from a startup based out of Chennai at 35LPA Fixed. I didn't negotiate with Walmart as I thought they would generally pay better than a startup, but ended up with just 28LPA Base pay with a location change from Chennai to Bangalore.

I googled and realize that the minimum base salary for Walmart IN4 is 30LPA but I got way less than that. Any thoughts on this one?

Should I consider this offer? How would you treat this offer?
